column4: Are you asking how to point something.yourdomain.com to yourdomain.com?
but i want o use both  something.yourdomain.com and yourdomain.com
You need to find set up your dns server to point both to your ip address. Then set up virtualhosts in apache. Just ask if you need help with any of that :)
ok i am trying to do that,thanks
Do you have your own server at home?
Ill take that as a no. You need a domain name (you already got this), and a hosting plan (you need this). The hosting plan lets you upload your site so people can go to it.
Okay, what domain did you buy?
its private but for xample www.harshutech.com
I know that we need domain+hosting both and i have both
Then PM me the name so I can look. What is the registrar and host?
ok see this is my website http://www.appsmyth.com/ and i want to access like this http://sk.appsmyth.com/
sacarlson: chances are you transferred to domain to the host, so go your hosts admin page and look for "subdomains"
sacarlson t #appache2 to see how to setup more virtual servers or "subdomains" ????????????
What hosting plan did you get?
